thread.title: Cleveland rising star writer Brendan Whitt hosts 'The Black Pen' to highlight local voices
thread.title_full: Cleveland rising star writer Brendan Whitt hosts 'The Black Pen' to highlight local voices

author: Nikki Delamotte, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland rising star writer Brendan Whitt hosts 'The Black Pen' to highlight local voices
text: Young writer Brendan Whitt is hosting "The Black Pen" at Mac's Backs bookstore on Coventry Rd. He'll be reading along with local writers J. Everett Prewitt and Rhonda Crowder.
